name: 薛文景
objective:
1. To study the first and 2nd law of the thermodynamics and deep impression which classical thermodynamics within the framework of applicability of its basic concepts will never be overthrown.
2.將熱力學定律應用於計算凝結相之化學位能與其平衡，逸壓和溶液熱力學.
schedule:
1-3rd. weeks:Steady and Non Steady States
4-5th. week :Review The second Law and ideal gas with1st.and 2nd. Law
6-7th. week; Exergy or Availability
8th. week :Miderm Examination
9-10th. weeks: WorkPhase Equilibrium from Heat,
11-12th. week :
13th. week :Chemical Reaction 
14-15th. week :Equilibrium Engineering Fluieds- Enthalpy and Entropy

16th: week Final Exam
scorePolicy:
midterm 30%
